p: To evaluate the herbicidal effect, the number of germinated seeds in 5 µL /mL and 10 µL /mL pod trays was counted and compared with those of control and blank samples. Emergence of the hypocotyl (≥1 mm) was used as an index of germination and seedling length data were recorded every two days, coinciding with watering days over 33 or 20 days.
